description: SUZANNE HAZELTON is a successful coach, trainer, author and speaker. With a strong business background, she’s qualified in many different approaches to bring out the best in others. These include: Advanced training in Transactional Analysis psychotherapy, NLP (Mprac), MBTI and Firo-B. Additionally she’s gained a Master’s degree in Applied Positive Psychology– the science of well-being, happiness and motivation.
name: Suzanne Hazelton
